item.title: Resume
item.description: This resume contains some private information. If you wish to see it, please drop me an email and I’ll be more than happy to send you a copy.

item.title: Making Bash prompt useful - S01E01
item.description: Introduction I like knowing about weather. Discussing weather is good old technique which always gets one out of an awkward silent “conversation” ðŸ˜‰. In the very first episode, we will try show weather information in the bash prompt. The idea is simple: Find some API to get current weather data - preferably free! Learn how bash prompt work. Ideally, this should have been the first thing to do, but nevermind… Write code to fetch weather data.

item.title: yarc - for the laziness in you
item.description: So, the other day I sat down watching The Matrix. Itâ€™s comfortable and relaxing; everythingâ€™s going great. The universal law of Conservation of Coziness comes to bite you! If you are a realist, you can relate. Being comfortable for long is not possible. The longer you remain relaxed, the more youâ€™ll have to work your ass off later. Okay, now going back to the story. I was relaxing and enjoying the great movie.
